name: Golden Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken simmered in creamy tomato-golden butter sauce, served with jasmine rice.

name: Herb Garden Pesto Pasta
description: Fresh basil pesto tossed with linguine and shaved parmesan — light, fragrant, heavenly.

name: Heavenly Roast Veg Bowl
description: Rainbow veggies roasted in olive oil and rosemary, served with couscous pearls.

name: Creamed Spinach Steak Roll
description: Soft grilled beef strips layered with creamy spinach and wrapped in golden pastry.

name: Eden Honey Glazed Wings
description: Crispy wings glazed in honey and spice — sweet, sticky, and gloriously golden.

name: Heaven on Earth Cheesecake
description: Silky baked vanilla cheesecake with a hint of lemon, drizzled with gold-dust syrup.

name: Divine Chocolate Tart
description: Rich dark chocolate tart in golden shortcrust pastry, finished with sea-salt flakes.
